page.title: 20FOUR MARKS: INTERVIEW CONTD
page.content:
7. Were the buildings like the ones we have now? A. Mrs Oates' house opposite hasn't changed. 8. Were there any shops in Four Marks when you first moved here or did you have to shop in Alton? A. Mr Dean (Grocer) Checkers Post Office, ironmongery, Tuck Shop, Butcher, Off-licence. 9. Do you think Four Marks is a good place to live? A. Yes, a very interesting place to live.
{This text was researched and prepared {by the children of Four Marks County {Primary School, with the assistance of {Mr.Morley and Mrs.Hodgson. July 1985. { { }
